Description: Default unit of measure for Near Me distance.

Attribute: Default Group Geo Map Label Format
Description: Default format of Group Geo Map labels.

Attribute: Default KPI Geo Map Label Format
Description: Default format of KPI Geo Map labels.

Attribute: Show Geo Map Info Window On Large Screens
Description: Controls whether or not to display the pop-up Geo Map info windows on screens with 768 or more pixels of horizontal resolution.

Attribute: Show Geo Map Info Window On Small Screens
Description: Controls whether or not to display the pop-up Geo Map info windows on screens with less than 768 pixels of horizontal resolution.

Controls how close geo map markers must be before merging. (Note: 1 will always keep them separated unless they have the same lat/long. Higher numbers force a merge sooner for objects when zooming. 1 min and 200 max).

Attribute: Show Location History on Geo Map
Description: Controls whether or not location history is shown on the Geo Map. This feature requires that location data (latitude/longitude) is interfaced based.
Controls how location history is displayed on the Geo Map.
